```{r setup}
library(miamiplot)
```

This document acts as a tutorial for using the miamiplot package to create Miami
plots for GWAS or EWAS results. Use `?FunctionName` in the R console to get the 
complete documentation of a given function.

Get data
```{r}
sourceurl <- "https://www.dropbox.com/s/zmivpo0b9s0acka/102250.gwas.imputed_v3.both_sexes.tsv.bgz?dl=0"
tmp <- tempfile()

download.file(sourceurl,tmp)
##
sweet_gwas <- read.csv(
  gzfile(tmp),
  sep="\t",
  header=TRUE,
  stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```

```{r}
sweet_gwas <- fread("https://www.dropbox.com/s/zmivpo0b9s0acka/102250.gwas.imputed_v3.both_sexes.tsv.bgz?dl=0")
```
